009package Ch09_AutomaticThresholding;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
013import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
014import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
015import imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils;
016
017/**
018 * <p>
019 * ImageJ demo plugin making available a selection of adaptive thresholders. See
020 * Sec. 9.2 of [1] for additional details. This plugin works on 8-bit grayscale
021 * images only. The original image is modified to a binary image.
022 * </p>
023 * <p>
024 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An Algorithmic
025 * Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer (2022).
026 * </p>
027 * 
028 * @author WB
029 * @version 2022/04/01
030 * 
031 * @see Adaptive_Bernsen
032 * @see Adaptive_Interpolating
033 * @see Adaptive_Niblack
034 * @see Adaptive_Sauvola
035 */
036public class Adaptive_All implements PlugInFilter {
037        
038        enum Algorithm {
039                Bernsen(Adaptive_Bernsen.class), 
040                Interpolating(Adaptive_Interpolating.class),
041                Niblack(Adaptive_Niblack.class),
042                Sauvola(Adaptive_Sauvola.class);
043                
044                final Class<? extends PlugInFilter> pluginClass;
045                
046                Algorithm(Class<? extends PlugInFilter> cls) {  //constructor
047                        this.pluginClass = cls;
048                }
049        }
050        
051        private static Algorithm algo = Algorithm.Bernsen;
052        private ImagePlus im = null;
053        
054        @Override
055        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
056                this.im = im;
057                return DOES_8G;
058        }
059
060        @Override
061        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
062                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
063                gd.addEnumChoice("Algorithm", algo);
064                
065                gd.showDialog();
066                if (gd.wasCanceled())
067                        return;
068                
069                im.unlock();
070                
071                algo = gd.getNextEnumChoice(Algorithm.class);
072                IjUtils.runPlugInFilter(algo.pluginClass);
073                
074//              IJ.runPlugIn(imp, algo.pluginClass.getCanonicalName(), null);
075        }
076
077}
